name: Once Upon a Time (itch) (Eduardo Muro)
description:
❓ What is this game about? ❓

Something in the screen changes every second... so every 10 seconds you'll see 10 changes! 

Once Upon a time is a 2D Dungeon Crawler Adventure Game, where something random in the screen changes every second! So be mindful with what you pick!

📖What's the story of the game?📖

The youngest son wants to tell a great adventure story, unfortunately he is bad at remembering the details, so the elements in the story might change

 Wasn't you a knight or a Lizardfolk? Wasn't your weapon a cleaver? Who knows!

🎯 What do I have to do? 🎯

Traverse the map while looking for the greatest treasure! And of course, you've to defeat the Big Bad Guy!

🎮 Controllers 🎮
  1. WASD - to move your character
  2. LMB - To attack
